hero.description: When I'm not coding, exploring the AI World or vibe coding my next "passive" App project, I'm probably behind a camera trying to look like a pro photographer—or out on my motorcycle, chasing the best death curve.

timeline.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer & AI Specialist
timeline.description: Leading development of innovative AI-powered applications and web solutions. Specializing in React, TypeScript, and machine learning integration for enterprise clients.

timeline.title: Lead Frontend Developer
timeline.description: Architected and built scalable web applications serving millions of users. Led a team of 5 developers in delivering high-performance React applications.

timeline.title: Full-Stack Developer
timeline.description: Developed end-to-end web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks. Collaborated with design teams to create intuitive user experiences.

timeline.title: Junior Web Developer
timeline.description: Contributed to various web development projects, gaining hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and basic backend technologies.

items.title: AI Task Manager
items.description: Intelligent task management system powered by machine learning algorithms for automatic prioritization.
items.longDescription: A comprehensive task management platform that uses advanced machine learning algorithms to automatically prioritize tasks based on deadlines, importance, and user behavior patterns. Features include smart notifications, collaborative workspaces, and detailed analytics.

items.title: Portfolio Generator
items.description: Create stunning portfolio websites in minutes with customizable templates and drag-and-drop interface.
items.longDescription: An intuitive portfolio builder that empowers creators to build beautiful, responsive portfolio websites without writing code. Features a drag-and-drop interface, customizable templates, and automatic optimization for all devices.

items.title: Social Analytics Dashboard
items.description: Real-time social media analytics platform with comprehensive insights and automated reporting.
items.longDescription: A powerful analytics platform that provides real-time insights into social media performance across multiple platforms. Includes automated reporting, audience analysis, and engagement tracking.

items.title: E-Commerce Platform
items.description: Full-featured online shopping platform with payment integration and inventory management.
items.longDescription: A complete e-commerce solution with secure payment processing, inventory management, and customer relationship tools. Built for scalability and performance with modern web technologies.
